statements: DELETE FROM user_feedback WHERE rating < 3 AND timestamp < '2022-09-01';
DELETE FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1 AND rating > 3;
DELETE FROM user_feedback WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND feedback_text LIKE '%great%';

DELETE FROM ARExperiences WHERE experience_rating < 3 AND experience_id IN (SELECT experience_id FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating < 3);
DELETE FROM user_feedback WHERE rating <= 2 AND experience_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 500 AND registration_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM feedback_ratings WHERE rating > 3 AND user_id = 5;
